ThingDef.label: Army Uniform
ThingDef.description: It consists of a white undershirt, a green uniform top with a belt, matching pants, and black boots.

ThingDef.label: Athletic Outfit
ThingDef.description: The athletic outfit appears as a tattered and stitched baseball uniform with boots and knee pads.

ThingDef.label: Benny
ThingDef.description: Benny's suit is a black and white buffalo plaid suit jacket worn with light grey dress pants, white dress shirt, and black tie

ThingDef.label: Brahmin Skin Outfit
ThingDef.description: A basic outfit consisting of a white shirt and patched overalls with Y-shaped suspenders complete with boots.

ThingDef.label: Bright Brotherhood Robe
ThingDef.description: These are robes worn by Bright Follower ghouls. They are slightly tattered and have a brownish-green color.

ThingDef.label: Business Pre War
ThingDef.description: A light beige suit with a blue tie.

ThingDef.label: Caravaneer Outfit
ThingDef.description: It consists of a dark brown shirt with orange and mustard-yellow stripes with a white satchel over the shoulder with the NCR logo on it. Around the neck is a red bandanna with black goggles.

ThingDef.label: Chained Prostitute Outfit
ThingDef.description: It appears as bondage harness on the chest with multiple leather bracelets and armbands. The bottom consists of a pair of low-rise, black leather pants
A short-sleeved armor with pauldrons and chest plates covering the torso.
ThingDef.label: Combat Armor

ThingDef.description: The Van Graff combat armor is colored matte black for "brand recognition purposes," but has no matching black helmet.
ThingDef.label: Combat Armor

ThingDef.description: Combat armor was issued within the United States Armed Forces during the Great War, this is the standard version of the armor
ThingDef.label: Combat Armor Light

ThingDef.description: Combat armor was issued within the United States Armed Forces during the Great War, this is the sturdy version of the armor
ThingDef.label: Combat Armor Sturdy

ThingDef.description: Combat armor was issued within the United States Armed Forces during the Great War, this is the heavy version of the armor
ThingDef.label: Combat Armor Heavy
Exposed Prostitute Outfit
ThingDef.description: This outfit consists of black cowboy boots, black ripped tights worn under gray boxers, chains covering the wearer's chest which are connected to a spiked choker necklace, and a wrestling singlet.

ThingDef.label: Fancy Gambler Dress
ThingDef.description: A worn brown dress with slingback high-heels.

ThingDef.label: Fancy Gambler Suit
ThingDef.description: A tan blazer with brown lapels and slacks, complete with a dark brown bow tie.

ThingDef.label: Field Hand Female Outfit
ThingDef.description: A red dress worn with a white apron and waterskins.

ThingDef.label: Field Hand Male Outfit
ThingDef.description: A black long-sleeve shirt with suspenders, brown rolled-up pants complete with a red scarf and black gloves.

ThingDef.label: Gas Ranger Outfit
ThingDef.description: Outfit invented by Rick, i don't know how to describe it, i'll ask him maybe

ThingDef.label: Grognak Female
ThingDef.description: A loincloth with a leather made bra.

ThingDef.label: Grognak Male
ThingDef.description: A loincloth.

ThingDef.label: The Inspector Costume
ThingDef.description: A costume version of the outfit worn by The Inspector, a Hubris Comics superhero and member of The Unstoppables!

ThingDef.label: Jason Bright Costume
ThingDef.description: Outfit worn by Jason Bright, it appears to resemble a weathered fancy gambler suit, without the tie.

ThingDef.label: Lab Coat Capital
ThingDef.description: A clean white lab coat with a blue undershirt and a brown tie. It provides a bonus to Intelligence while worn.

ThingDef.label: Lab Coat Commonwealth
ThingDef.description: A lab coat with a dosimeter on the left breast and with a white undershirt and a black tie. It provides a bonus to Intelligence while worn

ThingDef.label: Followers Lab Coat
ThingDef.description: A lab coat worn by the followers of the apocalypse. It provides a bonus to science and medicine while worn.

ThingDef.label: Leather Coat
ThingDef.description: The leather coat consists of a long, ankle length leather coat, with gloves and boots which appear to be made from duct tape.

ThingDef.label: Manta Man Costume
ThingDef.description: An outfit stylized to resemble that of the Hubris Comics superhero Manta Man.

ThingDef.label: Merc Adventurer Outfit
ThingDef.description: A large leather jacket with torn-off sleeves, a red sweater underneath, a brown bandolier, along with several watches.

ThingDef.label: Merc Charmer Dress
ThingDef.description: A gray-blue suit top with a matching mini-skirt and ripped black fishnet tights.

ThingDef.label: Merc Charmer Suit
ThingDef.description: A faded teal suit jacket and pants with a gray shirt underneath, as well as a strange collar that protects the neck.

ThingDef.label: Merc Cruiser Outfit
ThingDef.description: A long leather jacket with the sleeves removed with a white T-shirt underneath.

ThingDef.label: Military Fatigues
ThingDef.description: The military fatigues consist of a dirty set of pea-green fatigues with black boots.

ThingDef.label: Mistress Mystery Costume
ThingDef.description: The outfit worn by the Mistress of Mystery, one of the longest-running and most popular superhero characters in the Hubris Comics universe.

ThingDef.label: Naughty Nightgown
ThingDef.description: A set of leopard print pajamas.

ThingDef.label: Naughty Nightwear
ThingDef.description: A set of leopard print pajamas.

ThingDef.label: Prospector Outfit
ThingDef.description: This outfit consists of denim overalls, a brown satchel, and a tan long sleeve shirt underneath.

ThingDef.label: Prostitute Outfit Female
ThingDef.description: This female outfit consists of a black leather crop-top with purple lacing down the sides of the sleeves and black leather lace-up short-shorts finished with a studded belt and spiked collar.

ThingDef.label: Prostitute Outfit Male
ThingDef.description: This male outfit consists of a sheriff's vest complete with the badge, jean short-shorts and cowboy boots.

ThingDef.label: Radiations Suit
ThingDef.description: The radiation suit is a suit that protects its wearer from the harmful effects of radiation to a certain extent.

ThingDef.label: Red Rocket Overalls
ThingDef.description: Overalls worn by the workers of the Red Rocket gas stations.

ThingDef.label: Regulator Duster
ThingDef.description: An outfit consisting of a black undershirt and a pair of gray canvas pants underneath a long, brown leather overcoat with the sleeves rolled up above the elbow.

ThingDef.label: Reinforced Combat Armor
ThingDef.description: A more advanced version of the standard combat armor.

ThingDef.label: Reinforced Combat Armor II
ThingDef.description: An even more advanced version of the reinforced combat armor, offering more protection.

ThingDef.label: Settler Female Outfit
ThingDef.description: An earth tone dress that comes down to the mid calves with a gray scarf wrapped around the neck.

ThingDef.label: Settler Male Outfit
ThingDef.description: an orange and brown plaid shirt with jean overalls. A handkerchief is wrapped around the neck.

ThingDef.label: Sheriff Duster
ThingDef.description: An outfit consisting of a black undershirt and a pair of gray canvas pants underneath a long, brown leather overcoat with the sleeves rolled up above the elbow. It sports a sheriff badge on the right breast.

ThingDef.label: Silver Shroud Costume
ThingDef.description: A recreation of the costume worn by the comic book character, the Silver Shroud.

ThingDef.label: Slave Rags
ThingDef.description: Worn by slaves of the Legion, slave rags offer no protection from the elements and are composed of a torn dirty white tunic with a red "X" painted on the chest.

ThingDef.label: Spring Pre War Dress
ThingDef.description: A pink dress with red heels.

ThingDef.label: Spring Pre War Shirt
ThingDef.description: A red plaid shirt and brown pants.

ThingDef.label: Surveyor Outfit
ThingDef.description: The surveyor outfit is a pocketed leather coat with brown cargo pants and dirty wingtip shoes, with a satchel and metal wire covering the right arm.

ThingDef.label: Wasteland Doctor Outfit
ThingDef.description: The wasteland doctor outfit consist of a white t-shirt, a small brown satchel bag, and brown cargo pants with pouches attached to the belt.

ThingDef.label: Wasteland Wanderer Outfit
ThingDef.description: Most wastelanders will wear this outfit. It consists of a tan zipped-up hoodie and cargo pants tucked into riding boots.
